hero.title: Accelerate Your Cloud Native FaaS Journey
hero.subtitle: AppsCode empowers businesses to design, deploy, and scale cloud native FaaS architectures that deliver performance, cost efficiency, and agility, without managing infrastructure.

title_with_small_cards.title: The Power of Going Serverless
title_with_small_cards.subtitle: Here’s why enterprises partner with AppsCode to modernize their applications and scale effortlessly:

service_details.title: Comprehensive Cloud Native FaaS Services
service_details.subtitle: AppsCode provides end-to-end cloud native FaaS consulting—from strategy to deployment and optimization, ensuring your applications are performant, scalable, and secure.

sections.title: Serverless Strategy & Advisory
sections.description: Define your cloud native FaaS roadmap with expert guidance on architecture, trade-offs, and best practices.
offerings: Assess existing systems and create a tailored migration or modernization roadmap for FaaS adoption.
Identify business goals, expected ROI, and performance priorities.
Design highly scalable, event-driven cloud native architectures using Kubernetes and microservices.

sections.title: Cloud Native FaaS Implementation
sections.description: Build production-grade FaaS solutions leveraging AWS Lambda, Google Cloud Functions, Azure Functions, Knative, and open-source frameworks like OpenFaaS and Fission.
offerings: Design event-driven serverless functions optimized for compute and cost efficiency.
Implement multi-cloud or hybrid FaaS deployments for flexibility and resilience.
Simplify CI/CD pipelines while eliminating infrastructure management overhead.

sections.title: Serverless CI/CD Automation
sections.description: Automate delivery with CI/CD pipelines built for serverless environments, ensuring rapid iteration and error-free releases.
offerings: Build automated deployment pipelines using AWS SAM, GCP Cloud Build, or GitHub Actions.
Integrate testing, monitoring, and rollback mechanisms for resilience.
Deliver updates faster while maintaining code quality and stability.

sections.title: Managed FaaS Operations
sections.description: Focus on innovation while AppsCode manages your FaaS environments—ensuring uptime, performance, and cost efficiency.
offerings: Continuous monitoring and optimization of function execution, latency, and cost.
24×7 automated incident response and real-time health checks.
Hands-off operational management to accelerate business value delivery.

sections.title: Managed FaaS Operations
sections.description: Focus on innovation while AppsCode manages your FaaS environments—ensuring uptime, performance, and cost efficiency.
offerings: Continuous monitoring and optimization of function execution, latency, and cost.
24×7 automated incident response and real-time health checks.
Hands-off operational management to accelerate business value delivery.

cards.title: Why Partner with AppsCode for Cloud Native FaaS?
cards.subtitle: Benefit from deep expertise in Kubernetes, cloud-native architectures, and FaaS solutions to accelerate innovation:

items.title: Certified Cloud & FaaS Experts
items.description: 170+ engineers including 4 CKS, 51 CKA, and 19 CKAD certified professionals.

items.title: Proven FaaS Implementation
items.description: Successfully delivered 100+ FaaS and cloud-native projects across enterprises and startups.

items.title: Early Cloud Native Innovator
items.description: Among the first in APAC to offer enterprise cloud native FaaS solutions.

items.title: Continuous Knowledge Transfer
items.description: Hands-on team training for cloud native FaaS and modern DevOps practices.

items.title: CNCF Contributor
items.description: AppsCode is a proud CNCF contributor and Kubernetes Certified Service Provider (KCSP).

items.title: Scalable Engineering Teams
items.description: On-demand cloud native FaaS engineers for rapid delivery without long hiring cycles.

industries.title: Industry-Focused Cloud Native FaaS Expertise
industries.subtitle: AppsCode blends cloud-native FaaS innovation with domain knowledge to achieve measurable business impact:
industries.additional_text: From fintech to healthcare, our FaaS strategies optimize performance, cost, and scalability for every industry.

sectors.title: Banking & Financial Services
sectors.description: Secure, compliant FaaS pipelines for digital banking, payments, and fintech solutions.

sectors.title: Technology & SaaS
sectors.description: Multi-tenant SaaS platforms and AI integration powered by cloud native FaaS.

sectors.title: Automotive
sectors.description: Event-driven FaaS solutions for connected vehicles and real-time analytics.

sectors.title: Energy & Utilities
sectors.description: Optimize monitoring, field operations, and analytics with serverless cloud native FaaS.

sectors.title: Healthcare
sectors.description: HIPAA-compliant FaaS pipelines for patient data, real-time processing, and scalability.

sectors.title: Travel & Hospitality
sectors.description: Deliver real-time personalization, booking, and analytics with cloud native FaaS.

open_source.title: Innovation Through Open Source
open_source.description: AppsCode actively contributes to Kubernetes, Knative, OpenFaaS, and cloud native ecosystems—driving FaaS innovation through community collaboration.
